into creative potential.”]The company principle of Prague is the collective conception. From the very beginning, the practice has believed in the virtues of exchange, crossing ideas, common effort, shared knowledge and enthusiasm. Prague studio believes in a socially engaged architecture. This approach is nourished by the numerous worldwide achievements made over the last forty years, and by a constant attention to the quality of public spaces and new uses.[/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” desctop_mt=”margin-lg-70t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-50t”][vc_column][vc_wrapper title=”This is what we do.” subtitle=”SERVICES” image=”1135″ color_style=”light”][vc_projects_posts templates=”services” post_type=”services” total_columns=”prague_count_col3″ gap_columns=”prague_gap_col15″ posts_per_page=”6″ button_link_class=”prague-services-link a-btn-2 creative” button_span_class=”a-btn-line” button_style=”creative”][/vc_wrapper][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-40t” tablets_mt=”margin-sm-20t”][vc_column][vc_headings subtitle=”TESTIMONIALS” title=”They love us.”][/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row desctop_mt=”margin-lg-20t” desctop_mb=”margin-lg-140b” tablets_mb=”margin-sm-70b”][vc_column][vc_testimonials autoplay=”3000″ speed=”2000″ loop=”true”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Mark Eganberg” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Jennifer Hilbertson” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”Lesley Grand” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][vc_testimonials_items name=”John Frick” description=”Incredible as always. This guys have excellent taste,modeling, texturing & rendering skills. The design fits in with what I would perceive as being Icelandic, the high wooden roof design and linear slatted interior elements and colours.” icon=”fa fa-quote-right”][/vc_testimonials][/vc_column][/vc_row]
